trans-unit.source: Carries information used to describe and handle a $DTN_WMKEYDOWN notification message

trans-unit.source: Virtual key code that represents the key that the user pressed

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a null terminated string that defines the control callback field.

trans-unit.source: The string comprises one or more "X" characters.

trans-unit.source: Contains information about the current system date and time from the DTP control.

target.mrk: Contains information about the current system date and time from the DTP control.

trans-unit.source: The owner of the control must modify the time information based on the user's keystroke.
